rows.label: tlk004101_04_msg0001
rows.name:
A war in Temperantia, the demilitarized
zone between Superbia and Invidia,
must be avoided at all costs...

rows.label: tlk004101_04_msg0002
rows.name: But it is likely that that was Superbia's goal all along.

rows.label: tlk004101_04_msg0003
rows.name:
The Pope has entrusted you to
defuse the situation, but should
worst come to worst...

rows.label: tlk004101_04_msg0004
rows.name:
We will have to take precautionary
measures.
